General.Name: Jiangsu Jiangnan High Polymer Fiber Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangsu Jiangnan High Polymer Fiber Co.,Ltd engages in the production and sale of composite short-fibers and polyester tops in China and internationally. The company offers fine denier, high-shrinkage, colored, and PTT polyester tops, as well as fleck top. It also provides sheath-core, side-by-side hollow, and Dingdao sea-island composite staple fibers, as well as Korean fibers. Its products are primarily used in sanitary materials, specialty papers, high-grade leather, wool spinning, and other fields. The company was founded in 1984 and is based in Suzhou, China.

2.Name: Mr. Zheng Zhong  Lu
2.Title: Director & Sec. of the Board of Directors
